name: Custom Stock Ledger
query:
select
se.workflow_state as "Status::200",
se.creation as "Date::300",
s.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:150",
i.item_name as "Item Name::200",
i.stock_uom as "Stock UOM::100",
IFNULL((select sle.actual_qty from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sle where sle.name = s.name and sle.item_code= s.item_code and sle.actual_qty >=0),0) as "IN Qty::100",
IFNULL((select sle.actual_qty from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sle where sle.name = s.name and sle.item_code= s.item_code and sle.actual_qty < 0),0) as "OUT Qty::100",
IFNULL((select sle.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sle where sle.name = s.name and sle.item_code= s.item_code ),0) as "Balance Qty::100",
s.voucher_no as "Voucher:Link/Stock Entry:200",
s.warehouse as "Warehouse::200",
se.remarks as "Remark::300"
from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as s left join `tabItem` as i
on s.item_code = i.name 
left join `tabStock Entry` as se
on se.name=s.voucher_no
where s.voucher_type = "Stock Entry" and se.stock_entry_type='Material Issue' and cast(se.creation as date) >= %(from_date)s and cast(se.creation as date) <= %(to_date)s and s.voucher_no like "MAT-STE-SIV-%%" and se.workflow_state != "Cancelled" and s.company = %(company)s
union
select 
sen.workflow_state as "Status::200",
sen.creation as "Date::300",
sei.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:150",
sei.item_name as "Item Name::200",
sei.stock_uom as "Stock UOM::100",
IFNULL((select sle.actual_qty from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sle where sle.name = sen.name and sle.item_code= sei.item_code and sle.actual_qty >=0),0) as "IN Qty::100",
-ABS(sei.qty) as "OUT Qty::100",
IFNULL((select sle.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sle where sle.name = sen.name and sle.item_code= sei.item_code ),0) as "Balance Oty::100",
sen.name as "Voucher:Link/Stock Entry:200",
sei.s_warehouse as "Warehouse::200",
sen.remarks as "Remark::300"
from `tabStock Entry` as sen 
left join `tabStock Entry Detail` as sei 
on sen.name=sei.parent
where sen.workflow_state = "Created" and cast(sen.creation as date) >= %(from_date)s and cast(sen.creation as date) <= %(to_date)s and sen.name like "MAT-STE-SIV-%%" and sen.stock_entry_type='Material Issue' and sen.company = %(company)s
